critique:
It should be white sails, rather than white flags.
The boat doesn't turn around; it turns to the right of the frame instead.

temporal.caption: Two men are sailing on the blue water, with their white boat with white flags, then they avoided the buoys on the water.
A plan written on a white paper with black pen, and then the plan is put into action, when the white boat sail on the water and turn around.

captions.full: Two men are sailing on the blue water, with their white boat with white flags, then they avoided the buoys on the water. A plan written on a white paper with black pen, and then the plan is put into action, when the white boat sail on the water and turn around.
